'Code behind Page - Add local subroutines for the page.
Sub FillViewer Me.List0.SetList( GetRecipeNames("Rcp_SLT")) End Sub
Sub FillData
Dim i As UShort ' Indice of list machine Dim ary() As String Dim view() As String Dim max As Integer
' Load list of template and number of items ary = GetRecipeNames("Rcp_SLT")
' Save the number of element max = ary.GetUpperBound(0)+1
' Resize the users names list to have the same size as the number of recipes Array.Resize(view, max)
' For each recipe For Each str As String In ary
' Read first line with the name, and save the path view(i) = GetRecipeIngredientValue("Rcp_SLT", str, "Name_User").ToString
i += 1 Next
Me.List0.SetList(view, ary)
RemoveHandler Me.List0.OnChange, AddressOf _Change AddHandler Me.List0.OnChange, AddressOf _Change
RemoveHandler Me.List0.ItemChange, AddressOf _Change2 AddHandler Me.List0.ItemChange, AddressOf _Change2
End Sub
Sub _Change
Me.Label0.Text = Me.List0.Selected
End Sub
Sub _Change2
Me.Label1.Text = Me.List0.Selected
End Sub
Sub Update
Me.Label0.Text = Me.List0.Selected
End Sub
